price: 2. Ma waxay dadku moodaan in loogaga tegayo inay yidhaahdaan: “Waan rumeynay (Xaqa) iyagoo aan la imtixaameyn?
arabic: أَحَسِبَ ٱلنَّاسُ أَن يُتۡرَكُوٓاْ أَن يَقُولُوٓاْ ءَامَنَّا وَهُمۡ لَا يُفۡتَنُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: aḥasiba al-nāsu an yut'rakū an yaqūlū āmannā wahum lā yuf'tanūna
